entries.title: Photos: Argentina batter Croatia to shoot for World Cup glory
entries.description: Lionel Messi's sparkling performance makes strong statement ahead of Sunday's ultimate showdown.

entries.title: Peru judge denies ex-President Castillo’s bid to end detention
entries.description: Pedro Castillo says he has been 'unjustly' detained as protesters continue to demand his freedom and early elections.

entries.title: Haiti prepares to roll out first cholera vaccines
entries.description: Initial shipment of more than 1.1 million cholera jabs to be distributed in areas with most reported cases, PAHO says.

entries.title: Photos: Fans go wild as Argentina advance into World Cup final
entries.description: Jubilant scenes at Lusail Stadium and main fan zone as Lionel Messi drives La Albiceleste to 3-0 victory over Croatia.

entries.title: Chile political parties agree to draft new constitution
entries.description: Agreement comes three months after voters rejected a replacement for current, Pinochet-era Magna Carta.

entries.title: FTX carried out ‘old-fashioned embezzlement’: CEO
entries.description: Customer assets at FTX were commingled with those of Alameda Research, exposing clients to significant losses.

entries.title: ‘Historic’: Biden signs bill protecting LGBTQ marriage into law
entries.description: Landmark legislation protects LGBTQ and interracial marriage amid concerns over possible US Supreme Court rollback.

entries.title: UK PM announces new measures to curb ‘illegal’ immigration
entries.description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak says will introduce legislation to halt people from remaining in the UK 'illegally'.

entries.title: Recap: Argentina vs Croatia – World Cup 2022
entries.description: Messi scores one and sets up two as Argentina beat Croatia 3-0 to reach the World Cup 2022 final.

entries.title: Messi leads Argentina to World Cup final in 3-0 win over Croatia
entries.description: Argentina's talisman and captain was in sparkling form during his side's semifinal clash at Lusail Stadium.

entries.title: Binance withdrawals hit $1.9bn in past 24 hours says data firm
entries.description: The world's biggest crypto exchange said it had 'temporarily paused' withdrawals as CEO said it was 'business as usual'.

entries.title: Canada to end military involvement in sexual misconduct probes
entries.description: The move is meant to make the investigation and prosecution of sexual offences more impartial.

entries.title: Bodies of 27 migrants, including children, found in Chad desert
entries.description: The migrants left a year and a half ago in a truck and are believed to have been lost in the desert and died of thirst.

entries.title: What does the US hope to achieve with African leaders’ summit?
entries.description: President Joe Biden is trying to revive US relations with the continent as China and Russia expand their influence.

entries.title: US inflation easing as consumer prices rise modestly second month
entries.description: Consumer prices saw the slowest increase in 15 months, paving way for lower interest rate hikes.

entries.title: French court sentences eight for 2016 truck attack in Nice
entries.description: Two of the eight convicted were given 18 years behind bars for helping Mohamed Lahouaiej-Bouhlel kill 86 people.

entries.title: US braces for tornadoes, blizzards as winter storm heads east
entries.description: Officials warn against travel in parts of the US, as extreme weather brings white-out conditions, heavy rain and gusts.

entries.title: Morocco shirts sell out as World Cup fever grows
entries.description: Shopkeepers in Qatar struggle to meet demand for merchandise ahead of Morocco's historic semifinal against France.

entries.title: NASA Mars rover captures first sound of dust devil on red planet
entries.description: The Perseverance rover happened to have its microphone on when the 18-metre (390-foot) dust devil passed over it.

entries.title: US charges FTX’s Bankman-Fried with fraud
entries.description: Prosecutors said he defrauded customers by misappropriating their deposits to pay for expenses, debt and investments.

entries.title: European parliament sacks vice president amid corruption probe
entries.description: Eva Kaili is one of four charged in the alleged bribery case in which prosecutors pointed fingers at a Gulf nation.

entries.title: ‘You’re not welcome’: Mexico City residents decry Airbnb
entries.description: Airbnb units in the city's central areas can list for eight times the price of long-term rentals, pushing out locals.

entries.title: Garrincha: Brazil’s ‘Joy of the People’
entries.description: The troubled history of one of the greatest footballers to ever play the game.

entries.title: South Africa’s Ramaphosa avoids impeachment: A timeline

entries.title: ‘Important day’: US celebrates fusion energy breakthrough

entries.title: The Indian waiter with an ‘encyclopaedic’ knowledge of football
entries.description: In a bustling Doha restaurant, Abbas Koori shares his love of the sport and command of football trivia with customers.

entries.title: At least 50 killed as floods sweep DR Congo capital

entries.title: S Africa’s parliament votes against Ramaphosa impeachment move
entries.description: Majority of parliament voted not to initiate impeachment proceedings against the president over alleged misconduct.

entries.title: Ukraine’s wartime winter: Which energy facilities are at risk?

entries.title: Morocco coach hopes to ‘upset’ France in World Cup semifinal
